alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:28PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions the Chena River State Recreation Area through 800 PM AKDT... At 723 PM AKDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northeast of Pleasant Valley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will cross Chena Hot Springs Road near the Angel Rocks Trailhead, and may affect the Red Squirrel Campground and the Chena Hot Springs Resort. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
